questions: - What field is used to store the reference to the source from which the event was collected?
- How can I make sure to store the reference to the source from which the event was collected?
- What information can be found in the `source` field of the event?
answer:
# Where do I store the reference to the source from which the event was collected?
The reference to the source from which the event was collected is stored in the `source` field of the event.
